News.headline: Match Officials: Dagenham and Redbridge v Gateshead
News.page_title: Match Officials: Dagenham and Redbridge v Gateshead
News.URL_keywords: Match Officials: Dagenham and Redbridge v Gateshead
News.short_description: Saturday's referee for the Daggers' Vanarama National League home game against Gateshad has been named as Wayne Barratt.
News.description:
The two assistants have been named as Daniel Bonneywell and Paul Yates with the fourth official being David Hutton.

Ticket information for the game can be found here.
